event.title: donated by the late Dr. Frederick C. Freed in 1955

data.event: Trenton is most famous for its collection of rare antique porcelain veilleuses, donated by the late Dr. Frederick C. Freed in 1955.

event.title: established by the city in the 1950s

data.event: Trenton is also known for its unusual speed limit of 31 miles per hour (50 km/h), established by the city in the 1950s and posted by signs throughout the town.
